name: Minecraft NES Edition
description:
This is a game made for the Demake Jam.

This is a remake of Minecraft but in the style of an NES game. This took a little under a week to make.

Controls

Controllers are supported in the game and I would recommend using one as using the keyboard is a little finicky to use.

(below is the tile sheet and sprite sheet, if you want to look at it)

UPDATES

Update 1.0.1:

  • Zombies can no longer walk through walls and objects.
  • Wheat was an unobtainable item. But now there's a 25% chance of getting Wheat Seeds from destroying grass.
